 2812: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2813: 
 2814: traffic_send_and_recv_chunks_stream(InitState) ->
 2815:     ServerSeq =
 2816:         [
 2817:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 2818:          #{desc => "await start",
 2819:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2820:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2821:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2822:                    end},
 2823:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2824:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2825:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2826:                            ok
 2827:                    end},
 2828: 
 2829:          %% *** Init part ***
 2830:          #{desc => "which local address",
 2831:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 2832:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2833:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 2834:                    end},
 2835:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 2836:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 2837:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 2838:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2839:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 2840:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 2841:                                    {skip, Reason};
 2842:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2843:                                    ERROR
 2844:                            end
 2845:                    end},
 2846:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 2847:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2848:                          lsock    := LSock,
 2849:                          local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 2850:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2851:                                ok ->
 2852:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 2853:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2854:                                    ERROR
 2855:                            end;
 2856:                       (#{lsock    := LSock,
 2857:                          local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 2858:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2859:                                ok ->
 2860:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 2861:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 2862:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2863:                                    ERROR
 2864:                            end
 2865:                    end},
 2866:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 2867:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 2868:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 2869:                    end},
 2870:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2871:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2872:                          tester   := Tester,
 2873:                          local_sa := LSA}) ->
 2874:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 2875:                            ok;
 2876:                       (#{tester   := Tester,
 2877:                          local_sa := LSA,
 2878:                          lport    := Port}) ->
 2879:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 2880:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 2881:                            ok
 2882:                    end},
 2883: 
 2884:          %% The actual test
 2885:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 2886:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2887:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 2888:                    end},
 2889:          #{desc => "accept",
 2890:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 2891:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 2892:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2893:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 2894:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2895:                                    ERROR
 2896:                            end
 2897:                    end},
 2898:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 2899:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2900:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 2901:                            ok
 2902:                    end},
 2903: 
 2904:          #{desc => "await continue (recv-many-small)",
 2905:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2906:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_many_small)
 2907:                    end},
 2908:          #{desc => "recv chunk 1",
 2909:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 2910:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2911:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2912:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 1 of ~p bytes",
 2913:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2914:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)]}};
 2915:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2916:                                    ERROR
 2917:                            end
 2918:                    end},
 2919:          #{desc => "recv chunk 2",
 2920:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2921:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2922:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2923:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2924:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 2 of ~p bytes",
 2925:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2926:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2927:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2928:                                    ERROR
 2929:                            end
 2930:                    end},
 2931:          #{desc => "recv chunk 3",
 2932:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2933:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2934:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2935:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2936:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 3 of ~p bytes",
 2937:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2938:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2939:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2940:                                    ERROR
 2941:                            end
 2942:                    end},
 2943:          #{desc => "recv chunk 4",
 2944:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2945:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2946:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2947:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2948:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 4 of ~p bytes",
 2949:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2950:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2951:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2952:                                    ERROR
 2953:                            end
 2954:                    end},
 2955:          #{desc => "recv chunk 5",
 2956:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2957:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2958:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2959:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2960:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 5 of ~p bytes",
 2961:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2962:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2963:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2964:                                    ERROR
 2965:                            end
 2966:                    end},
 2967:          #{desc => "recv chunk 6",
 2968:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2969:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2970:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2971:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2972:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 6 of ~p bytes",
 2973:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2974:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2975:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2976:                                    ERROR
 2977:                            end
 2978:                    end},
 2979:          #{desc => "recv chunk 7",
 2980:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2981:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2982:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2983:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2984:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 7 of ~p bytes",
 2985:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2986:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2987:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2988:                                    ERROR
 2989:                            end
 2990:                    end},
 2991:          #{desc => "recv chunk 8",
 2992:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 2993:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 2994:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 2995:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 2996:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 8 of ~p bytes",
 2997:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 2998:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 2999:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3000:                                    ERROR
 3001:                            end
 3002:                    end},
 3003:          #{desc => "recv chunk 9",
 3004:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 3005:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 3006:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 3007:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 3008:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 9 of ~p bytes",
 3009:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 3010:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 3011:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3012:                                    ERROR
 3013:                            end
 3014:                    end},
 3015:          #{desc => "recv chunk 10",
 3016:            cmd  => fun(#{csock  := Sock,
 3017:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 3018:                            case socket:recv(Sock, 100) of
 3019:                                {ok, Chunk} ->
 3020:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv of chunk 10 of ~p bytes",
 3021:                                                [size(Chunk)]),
 3022:                                    {ok, State#{chunks => [b2l(Chunk)|Chunks]}};
 3023:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3024:                                    ERROR
 3025:                            end
 3026:                    end},
 3027:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv-many-small)",
 3028:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 3029:                          chunks := Chunks} = State) ->
 3030:                            Data = lists:flatten(lists:reverse(Chunks)),
 3031:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_many_small, Data),
 3032:                            {ok, maps:remove(chunks, State)}
 3033:                    end},
 3034: 
 3035:          #{desc => "await continue (recv-one-big)",
 3036:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3037:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_one_big) of
 3038:                                {ok, Size} ->
 3039:                                    {ok, State#{size => Size}};
 3040:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3041:                                    ERROR
 3042:                            end
 3043:                    end},
 3044:          #{desc => "recv (one big)",
 3045:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, csock := Sock, size := Size} = _State) ->
 3046:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 3047:                            case socket:recv(Sock, Size) of
 3048:                                {ok, Data} ->
 3049:                                    ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester,
 3050:                                                        recv_one_big,
 3051:                                                        b2l(Data)),
 3052:                                    ok;
 3053:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3054:                                    ERROR
 3055:                            end
 3056:                    end},
 3057: 
 3058:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 3059:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3060:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 3061:                                ok ->
 3062:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 3063:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3064:                                    ERROR
 3065:                            end
 3066:                    end},
 3067:          #{desc => "close connection socket (just in case)",
 3068:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 3069:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 3070:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 3071:                    end},
 3072:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 3073:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 3074:                          lsock    := Sock,
 3075:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 3076:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3077:                            State1 =
 3078:                                unlink_path(Path,
 3079:                                            fun() ->
 3080:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 3081:                                            end,
 3082:                                            fun() -> State end),
 3083:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 3084:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 3085:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 3086:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 3087:                    end},
 3088: 
 3089:          %% *** We are done ***
 3090:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3091:         ],
 3092: 
 3093:     ClientSeq =
 3094:         [
 3095:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 3096:          #{desc => "await start",
 3097:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3098:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3099:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
 3100:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 3101:                    end},
 3102:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3103:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3104:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3105:                            ok
 3106:                    end},
 3107: 
 3108:          %% *** Init part ***
 3109:          #{desc => "create node",
 3110:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3111:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 3112:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 3113:                    end},
 3114:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 3115:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 3116:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 3117:                            ok
 3118:                    end},
 3119:          #{desc => "start remote client",
 3120:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 3121:                            Pid = traffic_snr_tcp_client_start(Node),
 3122:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("client ~p started", [Pid]),
 3123:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
 3124:                    end},
 3125:          #{desc => "monitor remote client",
 3126:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
 3127:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3128:                            ok

 3642:                                    {ok, maps:remove(data, State)};
 3643:                                {ok, OtherData} ->
 3644:                                    {error, {mismatched_data, Data, OtherData}};
 3645:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3646:                                    ERROR
 3647:                            end
 3648:                    end},
 3649: 
 3650:          %% Terminations
 3651:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 3652:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3653:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3654:                            ok
 3655:                    end},
 3656:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 3657:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 3658:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3659:                                ok ->
 3660:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 3661:                                    {ok, State1};
 3662:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3663:                                    ERROR
 3664:                            end
 3665:                    end},
 3666:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 3667:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3668:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3669:                            ok
 3670:                    end},
 3671:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 3672:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 3673:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3674:                                ok ->
 3675:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 3676:                                    {ok, State1};
 3677:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3678:                                    ERROR
 3679:                            end
 3680:                    end},
 3681: 
 3682: 
 3683:          %% *** We are done ***
 3684:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3685:         ],
 3686: 
 3687:     i("start server evaluator"),
 3688:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 3689:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 3690: 
 3691:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 3692:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 3693:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 3694: 
 3695:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 3696:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 3697:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 3698:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3699: 
 3700:     i("await evaluator"),
 3701:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 3702:     
 3703: 
 3704: 
 3705: traffic_snr_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
 3706:     Self = self(),
 3707:     Fun  = fun() -> traffic_snr_tcp_client(Self) end,
 3708:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 3709: 
 3710: traffic_snr_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 3711:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 3712:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 3713:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 3714:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 3715:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 3716:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock),
 3717:     Reason = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 3718:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path),
 3719:     exit(Reason).
 3720: 
 3721: 
 3722: traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock) ->
 3723:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, send) of
 3724:         {ok, stop} -> % Breaks the loop
 3725:             ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3726:             ok;
 3727:         {ok, Data} ->
 3728:             case socket:send(Sock, Data) of
 3729:                 ok ->
 3730:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3731:                     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock);
 3732:                 {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3733:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ERROR),
 3734:                     exit({send, Reason})
 3735:             end;
 3736:         {error, Reason} ->
 3737:             exit({await_continue, Reason})
 3738:     end.
 3739: 
 3740: traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 3741:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 3742:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 3743:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 3744:     {ServerSA, Proto} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 3745:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 3746:     Sock     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto),
 3747:     Path     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain),
 3748:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path}.
 3749: 
 3750: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 3751:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start -> entry"),
 3752:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 3753: 
 3754: traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto) ->
 3755:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_create -> entry"),
 3756:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 3757:         {ok, Sock} ->
 3758:             Sock;
 3759:         {error, Reason} ->
 3760:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 3761:     end.
 3762: 
 3763: traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 3764:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind -> entry"),
 3765:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3766:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3767:         ok ->
 3768:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 3769:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 3770:                     Path;
 3771:                 {ok, _} ->
 3772:                     undefined;
 3773:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 3774:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 3775:             end;
 3776:         {error, Reason} ->
 3777:             exit({bind, Reason})
 3778:     end.
 3779: 
 3780: traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3781:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 3782: 
 3783: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3784:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue -> entry"),
 3785:     ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan).
 3786: 
 3787: traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 3788:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect -> entry"),
 3789:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 3790:         ok ->
 3791:             ok;
 3792:         {error, Reason} ->
 3793:             exit({connect, Reason})
 3794:     end.
 3795: 
 3796: traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path) ->
 3797:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_close -> entry"),
 3798:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 3799:         ok ->
 3800:             unlink_path(Path),
 3801:             ok;
 3802:         {error, Reason} ->
 3803:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 3804:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 3805:             unlink_path(Path),
 3806:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 3807:     end.
 3808: 
 3809: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 3810:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate -> entry"),
 3811:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 3812:         ok ->
 3813:             ok;
 3814:         {error, Reason} ->
 3815:             Reason
 3816:     end.
 3817: 
 3818:

 3836:            fun() ->
 3837:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,

 3839:                                  msg    => Msg,
 3840:                                  num    => Num},
 3841:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)

 4184: %% This is the 'large' message test case,
 4185: %% for SCTP and IPv4.

 4190:     Num = ?TPP_NUM(Config, ?TPP_LARGE_NUM),

 4202:                                  proto  => sctp,

 4241: 
 4242: %% This test case is a bit extreme and fails on some hosts
 4243: %% (e.g. OpenIndiana Hipster), so exclude them.
 4244: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond() ->
 4245:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
 4246: 
 4247: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, sunos}, _) ->
 4248:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4249: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, linux}, _) ->
 4250:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")));
 4251: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(_, _) ->
 4252:     ok.
 4253: 
 4254: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Welcome to SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 (i586)" ++ _) ->
 4255:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4256: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
 4257:     skip("Very slow VM");
 4258: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(_) ->
 4259:     ok.

 5023: 
 5024: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5025: 
 5026: %% Ping-Pong for TCP
 5027: 
 5028: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState) ->
 5029:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) -> socket:send(Sock, Data) end,
 5030:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> socket:recv(Sock, Sz) end,
 5031:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 5032:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 5033:                            },
 5034:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5035: 
 5036: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(#{domain := local} = InitState) ->
 5037:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5038:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5039:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5040:                        %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 5041:                        {ok, #{addr  := #{family := local},
 5042:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5043:                            {ok, Data};
 5044:                        {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 5045:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5046:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5047:                        %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 5048:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5049:                            {ok, Data};
 5050:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5051:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5052:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5053:                            ERROR
 5054:                    end
 5055:            end,
 5056:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5057:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2);
 5058: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(InitState) ->
 5059:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5060:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5061:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5062:                            {ok, Data};
 5063:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5064:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5065:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5066:                            ERROR
 5067:                    end
 5068:            end,
 5069:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5070:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2).
 5071: 
 5072: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState) ->
 5073:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) when is_binary(Data) ->
 5074:                    Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 5075:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 5076:               (Sock, Data) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 5077:                    Msg = #{iov => Data},
 5078:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 5079:            end,
 5080:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send}, % Send function
 5081:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5082: 
 5083: 
 5084: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 5085:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 5086:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 5087: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("RcvBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5088: 			      [RcvSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5089:                   if (RcvSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5090:                           NewRcvSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5091:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, NewRcvSz) of
 5092: 			      ok ->
 5093: 				  ok;
 5094: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5095: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5096:                                           "not allowed", 
 5097:                                           [rcvbuf, NewRcvSz]));
 5098: 			      {error, Reason1} ->
 5099: 				  ?FAIL({rcvbuf, Reason1})
 5100: 			  end;
 5101:                      true ->
 5102:                           ok
 5103:                   end,
 5104:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 5105: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("SndBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5106: 			      [SndSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5107:                   if (SndSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5108:                           NewSndSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5109:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, NewSndSz) of
 5110: 			      ok ->
 5111: 				  ok;
 5112: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5113: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5114:                                           "not allowed", 
 5115:                                           [sndbuf, NewSndSz]));
 5116: 			      {error, Reason2} ->
 5117: 				  ?FAIL({sndbuf, Reason2})
 5118: 			  end;
 5119:                      true ->
 5120:                           ok
 5121:                   end,
 5122:                   case os:type() of
 5123:                       {win32, nt} ->
 5124:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 12*1024);
 5125:                       _ ->
 5126:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, {12, 1024})
 5127:                   end
 5128:           end,
 5129:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 5130: 
 5131: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState) ->
 5132:     ServerSeq =
 5133:         [
 5134:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5135:          #{desc => "await start",
 5136:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5137:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5138:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5139:                    end},
 5140:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5141:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5142:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5143:                            ok
 5144:                    end},
 5145: 
 5146:          %% *** Init part ***
 5147:          #{desc => "which local address",
 5148:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5149:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5150:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 5151:                    end},
 5152:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 5153:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 5154:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5155:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5156:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 5157:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 5158:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5159:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5160:                                    ERROR
 5161:                            end
 5162:                    end},
 5163:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5164:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5165:                          lsock  := LSock,
 5166:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 5167:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5168:                                ok ->
 5169:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 5170:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5171:                                    ERROR
 5172:                            end;
 5173:                       (#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 5174:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5175:                                ok ->
 5176:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 5177:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 5178:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 5179:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5180:                                    ERROR
 5181:                            end
 5182:                    end},
 5183:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 5184:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 5185:                            BufInit(LSock)
 5186:                    end},
 5187:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 5188:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 5189:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 5190:                    end},
 5191:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5192:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5193:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 5194:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 5195:                            ok;
 5196:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, lport := Port}) ->
 5197:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5198:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 5199:                            ok
 5200:                    end},
 5201: 
 5202:          %% The actual test
 5203:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 5204:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5205:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 5206:                    end},
 5207:          #{desc => "accept",
 5208:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5209:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 5210:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5211:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 5212:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5213:                                    ERROR
 5214:                            end
 5215:                    end},
 5216:          #{desc => "create handler",
 5217:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5218:                            Handler = tpp_tcp_handler_create(),
 5219:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 5220:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 5221:                    end},
 5222:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 5223:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5224:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 5225:                            ok
 5226:                    end},
 5227:          #{desc => "transfer connection socket ownership to handler",
 5228:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler, csock := Sock} = _State) ->
 5229:                            socket:setopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process, Handler)
 5230:                    end},
 5231:          #{desc => "start handler",
 5232:            cmd  => fun(#{handler  := Handler,
 5233:                          csock    := Sock,
 5234:                          send     := Send,
 5235:                          recv     := Recv} = _State) ->
 5236:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 5237:                            ok
 5238:                    end},
 5239:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 5240:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5241:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5242:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 5243:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5244:                                ok ->
 5245:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 5246:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5247:                                    ERROR
 5248:                            end
 5249:                    end},
 5250:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 5251:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5252:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 5253:                            ok
 5254:                    end},
 5255:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 5256:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5257:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5258:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 5259:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 5260:                    end},
 5261:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 5262:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5263:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 5264:                            ok
 5265:                    end},
 5266:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 5267:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5268:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5269:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 5270:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5271:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5272:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 5273:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5274:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5275:                                    ERROR
 5276:                            end
 5277:                    end},
 5278:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 5279:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 5280:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 5281:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 5282:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5283:                    end},
 5284: 
 5285:          %% Termination
 5286:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5287:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5288:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5289:                                ok ->
 5290:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5291:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5292:                                    ERROR
 5293:                            end
 5294:                    end},
 5295:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 5296:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 5297:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 5298:                            ok
 5299:                    end},
 5300:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 5301:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5302:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 5303:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 5304:                            {ok, State1}
 5305:                    end},
 5306:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 5307:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 5308:                          lsock    := Sock,
 5309:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 5310:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5311:                            State1 =
 5312:                                unlink_path(Path,
 5313:                                            fun() -> 
 5314:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 5315:                                            end,
 5316:                                            fun() -> State end),
 5317:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 5318:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 5319:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5320:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 5321:                    end},
 5322: 
 5323:          %% *** We are done ***
 5324:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5325:         ],
 5326: 
 5327:     ClientSeq =
 5328:         [
 5329:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5330:          #{desc => "await start",
 5331:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5332:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5333:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 5334:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5335:                    end},
 5336:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5337:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5338:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5339:                            ok
 5340:                    end},
 5341: 
 5342:          %% *** Init part ***
 5343:          #{desc => "create node",
 5344:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5345:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 5346:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 5347:                    end},
 5348:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 5349:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 5350:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 5351:                            ok
 5352:                    end},
 5353:          #{desc => "create remote client",
 5354:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 5355:                            Pid = tpp_tcp_client_create(Node),
 5356:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client created: ~p", [Pid]),
 5357:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
 5358:                    end},
 5359:          #{desc => "monitor remote client",
 5360:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
 5361:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5362:                            ok
 5363:                    end},
 5364:          #{desc => "order remote client to start",
 5365:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := RClient,
 5366:                          proto     := Proto,
 5367:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
 5368:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
 5369:                          send      := Send,
 5370:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 5371:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(RClient, 
 5372:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
 5373:                                                 Send, Recv}),
 5374:                            ok
 5375:                    end},
 5376:          #{desc => "await remote client ready",
 5377:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5378:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5379:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, init, 
 5380:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5381:                                ok ->
 5382:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client started"),
 5383:                                    ok;
 5384:                                {error, {unexpected_exit, _, {bind, eaddrnotavail = Reason}}} ->
 5385:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client bind failure:"
 5386:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5387:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5388:                                {error, no_address = Reason} ->
 5389:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote valid address"),
 5390:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5391:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5392:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("remote client failure:"
 5393:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5394:                                    ERROR
 5395:                            end
 5396:                    end},
 5397:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5398:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5399:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5400:                            ok
 5401:                    end},
 5402: 
 5403:          %% The actual test
 5404:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 5405:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5406:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5407:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect, 
 5408:                                                [{rclient, RClient}]),
 5409:                            ok
 5410:                    end},
 5411:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
 5412:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5413:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect),
 5414:                            ok
 5415:                    end},
 5416:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
 5417:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5418:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5419:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect, 
 5420:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
 5421:                    end},
 5422:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 5423:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5424:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 5425:                            ok
 5426:                    end},
 5427:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
 5428:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5429:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5430:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
 5431:                                                send, 
 5432:                                                [{rclient, RClient}])
 5433:                    end},
 5434:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (send)",
 5435:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient,
 5436:                          msg     := Msg,
 5437:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
 5438:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
 5439:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, send, Data),
 5440:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
 5441:                    end},
 5442:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (send)",
 5443:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5444:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5445:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, send, 
 5446:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5447:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5448:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5449:                                {error,
 5450:                                 {unexpected_exit, rclient, noconnection}} ->
 5451:                                    %% One guess is that the message is so
 5452:                                    %% "large" that the client node died on us.
 5453:                                    %% Or so "large" that the connection (to
 5454:                                    %% the node) fails/dies.
 5455:                                    %% Either way, we assume this is not actually
 5456:                                    %% related to what we are testing => skip
 5457:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("lost connection "
 5458:                                                "to remote client node => SKIP"),
 5459:                                    {skip, {rclient, noconnection}};
 5460:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5461:                                    ERROR
 5462:                            end
 5463:                    end},
 5464:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 5465:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
 5466:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
 5467:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5468:                    end},
 5469: 
 5470:          %% Termination
 5471:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5472:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
 5473:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5474:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
 5475:                                                      [{rclient, RClient}]) of
 5476:                                ok ->
 5477:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5478:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5479:                                    ERROR
 5480:                            end
 5481:                    end},
 5482:          #{desc => "stop remote client",
 5483:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5484:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(RClient),
 5485:                            ok
 5486:                    end},
 5487:          #{desc => "await remote client termination",
 5488:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5489:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RClient),
 5490:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
 5491:                            {ok, State1}
 5492:                    end},
 5493:          #{desc => "stop client node",
 5494:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
 5495:                            {ok,
 5496:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
 5497:                                 ok ->
 5498:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
 5499:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 5500:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5501:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5502:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5503:                             catch
 5504:                                 C:E:S ->
 5505:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5506:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
 5507:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
 5508:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
 5509:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5510:                             end}
 5511:                    end},
 5512:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
 5513:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State) ->
 5514:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
 5515:                            receive
 5516:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
 5517:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
 5518:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5519:                                    {ok, State1}
 5520:                            end;
 5521:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
 5522:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
 5523:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5524:                            {ok, State1}
 5525:                    end},
 5526: 
 5527:          %% *** We are done ***
 5528:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5529:         ],
 5530: 
 5531:     TesterSeq =
 5532:         [
 5533:          %% *** Init part ***
 5534:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5535:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5536:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5537:                            ok
 5538:                    end},
 5539:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 5540:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5541:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5542:                            ok
 5543:                    end},
 5544: 
 5545:          %% Start the server
 5546:          #{desc => "order server start",
 5547:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5548:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5549:                            ok
 5550:                    end},
 5551:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5552:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5553:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5554:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5555:                    end},
 5556: 
 5557:          %% Start the client
 5558:          #{desc => "order client start",
 5559:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 5560:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 5561:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 5562:                            ok
 5563:                    end},
 5564:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 5565:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5566:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 5567:                    end},
 5568:  
 5569:          %% The actual test
 5570:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
 5571:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5572:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
 5573:                            ok
 5574:                    end},
 5575:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5576:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
 5577:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5578:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 5579:                            ok
 5580:                    end},
 5581:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 5582:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5583:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5584:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
 5585:                                             [{client, Client}]),
 5586:                            ok
 5587:                    end},
 5588:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 5589:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5590:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5591:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect, 
 5592:                                             [{server, Server}])
 5593:                    end},
 5594:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 5595:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5596:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 5597:                            ok
 5598:                    end},
 5599:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5600:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
 5601:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5602:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
 5603:                            ok
 5604:                    end},
 5605:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
 5606:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5607:                          client := Client} = State) ->
 5608:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
 5609:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
 5610:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5611:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
 5612:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5613:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
 5614:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5615:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
 5616:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5617:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
 5618:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5619:                                    ERROR
 5620:                            end
 5621:                    end},
 5622:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
 5623:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5624:                          client := Client,
 5625:                          num    := Num} = State) ->
 5626:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
 5627:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
 5628:                                {ok, {Num, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5629:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server result: "
 5630:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5631:                                    Result2 = erlang:delete_element(1, Result),
 5632:                                    {ok, State#{server_result => Result2}};
 5633:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5634:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bad server result: "
 5635:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5636:                                    {error, {invalid_server_result, BadResult}};
 5637:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5638:                                    ERROR
 5639:                            end
 5640:                    end},
 5641:          #{desc => "present result",
 5642:            cmd  => fun(#{server_result := SRes,
 5643:                          client_result := CRes,
 5644:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
 5645:                            {SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop} = SRes,
 5646:                            {CSent, CReceived, _, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
 5647:                            STime = tdiff(SStart, SStop),
 5648:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
 5649:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("process result data:"
 5650:                                        "~n   Num:          ~p"
 5651:                                        "~n   Server Sent:  ~p"
 5652:                                        "~n   Server Recv:  ~p"
 5653:                                        "~n   Server Start: ~p"
 5654:                                        "~n   Server Stop:  ~p"
 5655:                                        "~n   Server Time:  ~p"
 5656:                                        "~n   Client Sent:  ~p"
 5657:                                        "~n   Client Recv:  ~p"
 5658:                                        "~n   Client Start: ~p"
 5659:                                        "~n   Client Stop:  ~p"
 5660:                                        "~n   Client Time:  ~p",
 5661:                                        [Num,
 5662:                                         SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop,
 5663:                                         STime,
 5664:                                         CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop,
 5665:                                         CTime]),
 5666:                            if
 5667:                                (STime =:= 0) orelse
 5668:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
 5669:                                    {skip,
 5670:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time(s): ~w , ~w",
 5671:                                        [STime, CTime])};
 5672:                                true ->
 5673:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is 
 5674:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
 5675:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
 5676:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
 5677:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
 5678:                                    %% big for the small messages!
 5679:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
 5680:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
 5681:                                       "~n   Server: ~w msec"
 5682:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5683:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5684:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5685:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received"
 5686:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
 5687:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5688:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5689:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5690:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
 5691:                                       [Num,
 5692:                                        STime,
 5693:                                        STime / Num,
 5694:                                        Num / STime,
 5695:                                        SSent div STime,
 5696:                                        SReceived div STime,
 5697:                                        CTime,
 5698:                                        CTime / Num,
 5699:                                        Num / CTime,
 5700:                                        CSent div CTime,
 5701:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
 5702:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server_result, State),
 5703:                                    State2 = maps:remove(client_result, State1),
 5704:                                    {ok, State2}
 5705:                            end
 5706:                    end},
 5707: 
 5708:          %% Terminations
 5709:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 5710:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5711:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5712:                            ok
 5713:                    end},
 5714:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 5715:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 5716:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5717:                                ok ->
 5718:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 5719:                                    {ok, State1};
 5720:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5721:                                    ERROR
 5722:                            end
 5723:                    end},
 5724:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 5725:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5726:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5727:                            ok
 5728:                    end},
 5729:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 5730:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5731:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5732:                                ok ->
 5733:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 5734:                                    {ok, State1};
 5735:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5736:                                    ERROR
 5737:                            end
 5738:                    end},
 5739: 
 5740: 
 5741:          %% *** We are done ***
 5742:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5743:         ],
 5744: 
 5745:     i("start server evaluator"),
 5746:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
 5747:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
 5748:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
 5749:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
 5750:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
 5751:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 5752: 
 5753:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 5754:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 5755:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 5756: 
 5757:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 5758:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 5759:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
 5760:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
 5761:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 5762: 
 5763:     i("await evaluator"),
 5764:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 5765:     
 5766: 
 5767: tpp_tcp_handler_create() ->
 5768:     Self = self(),
 5769:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_tcp_handler(Self) end).
 5770: 
 5771: tpp_tcp_handler(Parent) ->
 5772:     tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent),
 5773:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent),
 5774:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5775:     tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
 5776:     Result = tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
 5777:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
 5778:     Reason = tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
 5779:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5780:     exit(Reason).
 5781: 
 5782: tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent) ->
 5783:     put(sname, "handler"),
 5784:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5785:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5786:     ok.
 5787: 
 5788: tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
 5789:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5790:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5791: 
 5792: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5793:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5794:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5795: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5796:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5797:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5798: 
 5799: tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5800:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5801:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5802:         ok ->
 5803:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5804:             ok;
 5805:         {error, Reason} ->
 5806:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5807:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5808:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5809:     end.
 5810: 
 5811: tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5812:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5813:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5814:         ok ->
 5815:             ok;
 5816:         {error, Reason} ->
 5817:             Reason
 5818:     end.
 5819: 
 5820: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
 5821:     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 0, 0, 0, undefined).
 5822: 
 5823: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5824:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
 5825:     case tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
 5826:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz} ->
 5827:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?SLIB:timestamp(); 
 5828:                           true -> Start end,
 5829:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
 5830:             case tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg) of
 5831:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
 5832:                     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5833:                                                       N+1,
 5834:                                                       Sent+SendSz,
 5835:                                                       Received+RecvSz,
 5836:                                                       NewStart);
 5837:                 {error, SReason} ->
 5838:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
 5839:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5840:             end;
 5841:         {error, closed} ->
 5842:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w", [N, Sent, Received]),
 5843:             Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5844:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
 5845:         {error, RReason} ->
 5846:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
 5847:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5848:     end.
 5849:             
 5850: %% The (remote) client process
 5851: 
 5852: tpp_tcp_client_create(Node) ->
 5853:     Self = self(),
 5854:     Fun  = fun() -> tpp_tcp_client(Self) end,
 5855:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 5856: 
 5857: tpp_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 5858:     tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 5859:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 5860:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 5861:     Sock     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
 5862:     Path     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
 5863:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5864:     tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 5865:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 5866:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 5867:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, send),
 5868:     Result = tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
 5869:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
 5870:     Reason = tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 5871:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path),
 5872:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5873:     exit(Reason).
 5874: 
 5875: tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 5876:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 5877:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5878:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5879:     ok.
 5880: 
 5881: tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 5882:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5883:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5884: 
 5885: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5886:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5887:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5888: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5889:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p): ~p", [Slogan, Extra]),
 5890:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5891: 
 5892: tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5893:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5894:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5895:         ok ->
 5896:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5897:             ok;
 5898:         {ok, Data} ->
 5899:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
 5900:             Data;
 5901:         {error, Reason} ->
 5902:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5903:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5904:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5905:     end.
 5906: 
 5907: tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5908:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5909:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5910:         ok ->
 5911:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: normal"),
 5912:             normal;
 5913:         {error, Reason} ->
 5914:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: ~w", [Reason]),
 5915:             Reason
 5916:     end.
 5917: 
 5918: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
 5919:     Start = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5920:     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, 
 5921:                                      Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
 5922: 
 5923: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
 5924:                                  Num, Num, Sent, Received,
 5925:                                  Start) ->
 5926:     Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5927:     Info = socket:info(Sock),
 5928:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5929:         ok ->
 5930:             {Sent, Received, Info, Start, Stop};
 5931:         {error, Reason} ->
 5932:             exit({failed_closing, Reason})
 5933:     end;
 5934: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, Data, 
 5935:                                  Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5936:     %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) try send ~w", [Num,N,size(Data)]),
 5937:     case tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) of
 5938:         {ok, SendSz} ->
 5939:             %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) sent - "
 5940:             %%   "now try recv", [Num,N]),
 5941:             case tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
 5942:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz} ->
 5943:                     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5944:                                                      NewData, Num, N+1,
 5945:                                                      Sent+SendSz, 
 5946:                                                      Received+RecvSz, 
 5947:                                                      Start);
 5948:                 {error, RReason} ->
 5949:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p: "
 5950:                                 "~n   ~p", [N, Num, RReason, ?MQ()]),
 5951:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5952:             end;
 5953:         {error, SReason} ->
 5954:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p"
 5955:                         "~n   ~p", [N, Num, SReason, ?MQ()]),
 5956:             case SReason of
 5957:                 emsgsize ->
 5958:                     exit({send, SReason, N, byte_size(Data)});
 5959:                 _ ->
 5960:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5961:             end
 5962:     end.
 5963: 
 5964: tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
 5965:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5966:         {ok, Sock} ->
 5967:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
 5968:             Sock;
 5969:         {error, Reason} ->
 5970:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 5971:     end.
 5972: 
 5973: tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 5974:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5975:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5976:         ok ->
 5977:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 5978:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 5979:                     Path;
 5980:                 {ok, _} ->
 5981:                     undefined;
 5982:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 5983:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 5984:             end;
 5985:         {error, Reason2} ->
 5986:             exit({bind, Reason2})
 5987:     end.
 5988: 
 5989: tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 5990:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 5991:         ok ->
 5992:             ok;
 5993:         {error, Reason} ->
 5994:             exit({connect, Reason})
 5995:     end.
 5996: 
 5997: tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
 5998:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5999:         ok ->
 6000:             unlink_path(Path),
 6001:             ok;
 6002:         {error, closed} ->
 6003:             ok;
 6004:         {error, Reason} ->
 6005:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 6006:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 6007:             unlink_path(Path),
 6008:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 6009:     end.
 6010: 
 6011:     
 6012:     
 6013: -define(TPP_REQUEST, 1).
 6014: -define(TPP_REPLY,   2).
 6015: 
 6016: tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
 6017:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
 6018: 
 6019: tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
 6020:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
 6021: 
 6022: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
 6023:     case Recv(Sock, 0) of
 6024:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} 
 6025:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
 6026:             %% We got it all
 6027:             {ok, Data, size(Msg)};
 6028:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} ->
 6029:             Remains = Sz - size(Data),
 6030:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remains, size(Msg), [Data]);
 6031:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>} ->
 6032:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
 6033:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6034:             ERROR
 6035:     end.
 6036: 
 6037: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remaining, AccSz, Acc) ->
 6038:     case Recv(Sock, Remaining) of
 6039:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining =:= size(Data)) ->
 6040:             %% We got the rest
 6041:             TotSz = AccSz + size(Data),
 6042:             {ok, erlang:iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([Data | Acc])), TotSz};
 6043:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining > size(Data)) ->
 6044:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, 
 6045:                          Remaining - size(Data), AccSz + size(Data),     
 6046:                          [Data | Acc]);
 6047:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6048:             ERROR
 6049:     end.
 6050:                                                          
 6051:             
 6052: tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6053:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data).
 6054: 
 6055: tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6056:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data).
 6057: 
 6058: tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data) ->
 6059:     DataSz = size(Data),
 6060:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
 6061:     tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, 0).
 6062: 
 6063: tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
 6064:     case Send(Sock, Msg) of
 6065:         ok ->
 6066:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
 6067:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
 6068:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
 6069:             tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
 6070:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6071:             ERROR
 6072:     end.
 6073:     
 6074: 
 6075: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6076: 
 6077: %% Ping-Pong for UDP
 6078: 
 6079: traffic_ping_pong_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp(InitState) ->
 6080:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6081:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6082:            end,
 6083:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)         ->
 6084:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock, Sz)
 6085:            end,
 6086:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6087:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6088:                            },
