 6089:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6090: 
 6091: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp(InitState) ->
 6092:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) when is_binary(Data) ->
 6093:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => [Data]},
 6094:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 6095:               (Sock, Data, Dest) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 6096:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => Data},
 6097:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 6098:            end,
 6099:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   ->
 6100:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 6101:                        {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 6102:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 6103:                            {ok, {Source, Data}};
 6104:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6105:                            ERROR
 6106:                    end
 6107:            end,
 6108:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6109:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6110:                            },
 6111:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6112: 
 6113: 
 6114: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 6115:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 6116:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 6117:                   if (RcvSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6118:                           i("adjust socket rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6119:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6120:                      true ->
 6121:                           ok
 6122:                   end,
 6123:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 6124:                   if (SndSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6125:                           i("adjust socket sndbuf buffer size"),
 6126:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6127:                      true ->
 6128:                           ok
 6129:                   end,
 6130:                   {ok, OtpRcvBuf} = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf),
 6131:                   if
 6132:                       (OtpRcvBuf =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6133:                           i("adjust otp rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6134:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6135:                       true ->
 6136:                           ok
 6137:                   end
 6138:           end,
 6139:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 6140: 
 6141: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState) ->
 6142:     ServerSeq =
 6143:         [
 6144:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6145:          #{desc => "await start",
 6146:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6147:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6148:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6149:                    end},
 6150:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6151:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6152:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6153:                            ok
 6154:                    end},
 6155: 
 6156:          %% *** Init part ***
 6157:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6158:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6159:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6160:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6161:                    end},
 6162:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6163:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 6164:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6165:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6166:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6167:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6168:                                    ERROR
 6169:                            end
 6170:                    end},
 6171:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6172:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6173:                          sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6174:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6175:                                ok ->
 6176:                                    ok;
 6177:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6178:                                    ERROR
 6179:                            end;
 6180:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6181:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6182:                                ok ->
 6183:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 6184:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 6185:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6186:                                    ERROR
 6187:                            end
 6188:                    end},
 6189:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 6190:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 6191:                            BufInit(Sock)
 6192:                    end},
 6193:          #{desc => "create handler",
 6194:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6195:                            Handler = tpp_udp_server_handler_create(),
 6196:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 6197:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 6198:                    end},
 6199:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 6200:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6201:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 6202:                            ok
 6203:                    end},
 6204:          #{desc => "start handler",
 6205:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6206:                          sock    := Sock,
 6207:                          send    := Send,
 6208:                          recv    := Recv} = _State) ->
 6209:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 6210:                            ok
 6211:                    end},
 6212:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 6213:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6214:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6215:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 6216:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6217:                                ok ->
 6218:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 6219:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6220:                                    ERROR
 6221:                            end
 6222:                    end},
 6223:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6224:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6225:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 6226:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 6227:                            ok;
 6228:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 6229:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6230:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 6231:                            ok
 6232:                    end},
 6233: 
 6234:          %% The actual test
 6235:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 6236:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6237:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6238:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 6239:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6240:                    end},
 6241:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 6242:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6243:                          sock    := _Sock} = _State) ->
 6244:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6245:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 6246:                            ok
 6247:                    end},
 6248:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 6249:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6250:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6251:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close, 
 6252:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6253:                    end},
 6254: 
 6255:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6256: 
 6257:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6258:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6259:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6260:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6261:                                ok ->
 6262:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 6263:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6264:                                    ERROR
 6265:                            end
 6266:                    end},
 6267:          #{desc => "(maybe) unlink socket",
 6268:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 6269:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6270:                            unlink_path(Path,
 6271:                                        fun() ->
 6272:                                                {ok, maps:remove(local_sa, State)}
 6273:                                        end,
 6274:                                        fun() ->
 6275:                                                ok
 6276:                                        end);
 6277:                       (_) ->
 6278:                            ok
 6279:                    end},
 6280:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 6281:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6282:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 6283:                            ok
 6284:                    end},
 6285:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 6286:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6287:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6288:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 6289:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6290:                                {ok, Result} ->
 6291:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 6292:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 6293:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6294:                                    ERROR
 6295:                            end
 6296:                    end},
 6297:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 6298:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 6299:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 6300:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 6301:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 6302:                    end},
 6303: 
 6304:          %% Termination
 6305:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6306:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6307:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6308:                                ok ->
 6309:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6310:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6311:                                    ERROR
 6312:                            end
 6313:                    end},
 6314:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 6315:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 6316:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 6317:                            ok
 6318:                    end},
 6319:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 6320:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6321:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 6322:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 6323:                            {ok, State1}
 6324:                    end},
 6325: 
 6326:          %% *** We are done ***
 6327:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6328:         ],
 6329: 
 6330:     ClientSeq =
 6331:         [
 6332:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6333:          #{desc => "await start",
 6334:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6335:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6336:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 6337:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 6338:                    end},
 6339:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6340:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6341:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6342:                            ok
 6343:                    end},
 6344: 
 6345:          %% *** Init part ***
 6346:          #{desc => "create node",
 6347:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6348:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 6349:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 6350:                    end},
 6351:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 6352:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 6353:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 6354:                            ok
 6355:                    end},
 6356:          #{desc => "create (remote) handler",
 6357:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 6358:                            Pid = tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node),
 6359:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Pid]),
 6360:                            {ok, State#{handler => Pid}}
 6361:                    end},
 6362:          #{desc => "monitor remote handler",
 6363:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Pid}) ->
 6364:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6365:                            ok
 6366:                    end},
 6367:          #{desc => "order remote handler to start",
 6368:            cmd  => fun(#{handler   := Handler,
 6369:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
 6370:                          proto     := Proto,
 6371:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
 6372:                          send      := Send,
 6373:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 6374:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, 
 6375:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
 6376:                                                 Send, Recv}),
 6377:                            ok
 6378:                    end},
 6379:          #{desc => "await (remote) handler ready",
 6380:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6381:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6382:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 6383:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
 6384:                    end},
 6385:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6386:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6387:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6388:                            ok
 6389:                    end},
 6390: 
 6391:          %% The actual test
 6392:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
 6393:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6394:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6395:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
 6396:                                                send, 
 6397:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6398:                    end},
 6399:          #{desc => "order handler to continue (send)",
 6400:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6401:                          msg     := Msg,
 6402:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
 6403:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
 6404:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, send, Data),
 6405:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
 6406:                    end},
 6407:          #{desc => "await remote handler ready (send)",
 6408:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6409:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6410:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, send, 
 6411:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6412:                                {ok, Result} ->
 6413:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client result: "
 6414:                                    %%             "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 6415:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 6416:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6417:                                    ERROR
 6418:                            end
 6419:                    end},
 6420:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 6421:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
 6422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
 6423:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 6424:                    end},
 6425: 
 6426:          %% Termination
 6427:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6428:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
 6429:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6430:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
 6431:                                                      [{handler, Handler}]) of
 6432:                                ok ->
 6433:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6434:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6435:                                    ERROR
 6436:                            end
 6437:                    end},
 6438:          #{desc => "stop (remote) handler",
 6439:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 6440:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 6441:                            ok
 6442:                    end},
 6443:          #{desc => "await (remote) handler termination",
 6444:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6445:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 6446:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 6447:                            {ok, State1}
 6448:                    end},
 6449:          #{desc => "stop client node",
 6450:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
 6451:                            {ok,
 6452:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
 6453:                                 ok ->
 6454:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
 6455:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 6456:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 6457:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6458:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 6459:                             catch
 6460:                                 C:E:S ->
 6461:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 6462:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
 6463:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
 6464:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
 6465:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 6466:                             end}
 6467:                    end},
 6468:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
 6469:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 6470:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
 6471:                            receive
 6472:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
 6473:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
 6474:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 6475:                                    {ok, State1}
 6476:                            end;
 6477:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
 6478:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
 6479:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 6480:                            {ok, State1}
 6481:                    end},
 6482: 
 6483:          %% *** We are done ***
 6484:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6485:         ],
 6486: 
 6487:     TesterSeq =
 6488:         [
 6489:          %% *** Init part ***
 6490:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 6491:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6492:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6493:                            ok
 6494:                    end},
 6495:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 6496:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6497:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6498:                            ok
 6499:                    end},
 6500: 
 6501:          %% Start the server
 6502:          #{desc => "order server start",
 6503:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6504:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6505:                            ok
 6506:                    end},
 6507:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 6508:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 6509:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 6510:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 6511:                    end},
 6512: 
 6513:          %% Start the client
 6514:          #{desc => "order client start",
 6515:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 6516:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 6517:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 6518:                            ok
 6519:                    end},
 6520:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 6521:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6522:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 6523:                    end},
 6524:  
 6525:          %% The actual test
 6526:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 6527:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6528:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 6529:                            ok
 6530:                    end},
 6531:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6532:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
 6533:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6534:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
 6535:                            ok
 6536:                    end},
 6537:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
 6538:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 6539:                          client := Client} = State) ->
 6540:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
 6541:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
 6542:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 6543:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
 6544:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 6545:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
 6546:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 6547:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
 6548:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 6549:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
 6550:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6551:                                    ERROR
 6552:                            end
 6553:                    end},
 6554:          #{desc => "order server continue (close)",
 6555:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6556:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
 6557:                            ok
 6558:                    end},
 6559:          #{desc => "await server ready (close)",
 6560:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6561:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, close)
 6562:                    end},
 6563:          %% Because of the way we control the server, there is no real 
 6564:          %% point in collecting statistics from it (the time will include
 6565:          %% our communication with it).
 6566:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
 6567:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 6568:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 6569:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
 6570:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
 6571:                                {ok, _Result} ->
 6572:                                    ok;
 6573:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6574:                                    ERROR
 6575:                            end
 6576:                    end},
 6577:          #{desc => "present result",
 6578:            cmd  => fun(#{client_result := CRes,
 6579:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
 6580:                            {CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
 6581:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
 6582:                            if
 6583:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
 6584:                                    {skip,
 6585:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time: ~w ", [CTime])};
 6586:                                true ->
 6587:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is
 6588:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
 6589:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
 6590:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
 6591:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
 6592:                                    %% big for the small messages!
 6593:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
 6594:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
 6595:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
 6596:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 6597:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 6598:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 6599:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
 6600:                                       [Num,
 6601:                                        CTime,
 6602:                                        CTime / Num,
 6603:                                        Num / CTime,
 6604:                                        CSent div CTime,
 6605:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
 6606:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client_result, State),
 6607:                                    {ok, State1}
 6608:                            end
 6609:                    end},
 6610: 
 6611:          %% Terminations
 6612:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 6613:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6614:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6615:                            ok
 6616:                    end},
 6617:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 6618:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 6619:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6620:                                ok ->
 6621:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 6622:                                    {ok, State1};
 6623:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6624:                                    ERROR
 6625:                            end
 6626:                    end},
 6627:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 6628:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6629:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6630:                            ok
 6631:                    end},
 6632:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 6633:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 6634:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6635:                                ok ->
 6636:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 6637:                                    {ok, State1};
 6638:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6639:                                    ERROR
 6640:                            end
 6641:                    end},
 6642: 
 6643: 
 6644:          %% *** We are done ***
 6645:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6646:         ],
 6647: 
 6648: 
 6649:     i("start server evaluator"),
 6650:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
 6651:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
 6652:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
 6653:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
 6654:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
 6655:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 6656: 
 6657:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 6658:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 6659:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 6660: 
 6661:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 6662:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 6663:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
 6664:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
 6665:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 6666: 
 6667:     i("await evaluator"),
 6668:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 6669: 
 6670: 
 6671: 
 6672: %% Server side handler process
 6673: %% We don't actually need a separate process for this socket, 
 6674: %% but we do it anyway to simplify the sequence.
 6675: tpp_udp_server_handler_create() ->
 6676:     Self = self(),
 6677:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_udp_server_handler(Self) end).
 6678: 
 6679: tpp_udp_server_handler(Parent) ->
 6680:     tpp_udp_server_handler_init(Parent),
 6681:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent),
 6682:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 6683:     tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
 6684:     Result = tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
 6685:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
 6686:     Reason = tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
 6687:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 6688:     exit(Reason).
 6689: 
 6690: tpp_udp_server_handler_init(Parent) ->
 6691:     put(sname, "shandler"),
 6692:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 6693:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 6694:     ok.
 6695: 
 6696: tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
 6697:     tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 6698:                                              0, 0, 0, undefined).
 6699: 
 6700: tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 
 6701:                                          N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 6702:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
 6703:     %% if 
 6704:     %%     (N =:= (?TPP_SMALL_NUM-2)) -> 
 6705:     %%         ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
 6706:     %%         socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true); 
 6707:     %%     true -> ok
 6708:     %% end,
 6709:     try tpp_udp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
 6710:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz, From} ->
 6711:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?SLIB:timestamp(); 
 6712:                           true -> Start end,
 6713:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
 6714:             try tpp_udp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg, From) of
 6715:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
 6716:                     tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 6717:                                                              N+1,
 6718:                                                              Sent+SendSz,
 6719:                                                              Received+RecvSz,
 6720:                                                              NewStart);
 6721:                 {error, SReason} ->
 6722:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
 6723:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 6724: 	    catch
 6725: 		SC:SE:SS ->
 6726: 		    exit({send, {SC, SE, SS}, N})
 6727:             end;
 6728:         {error, closed} ->
 6729:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w",
 6730:                         [N, Sent, Received]),
 6731:             Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 6732:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
 6733:         {error, RReason} ->
 6734:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
 6735:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
 6736:     catch
 6737: 	RC:RE:RS ->
 6738: 	    exit({recv, {RC, RE, RS}, N})	
 6739:     end.
 6740:   
 6741: 
 6742: %% The (remote) client side handler process
 6743: 
 6744: tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node) ->
 6745:     Self = self(),
 6746:     Fun  = fun() -> put(sname, "chandler"), tpp_udp_client_handler(Self) end,
 6747:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 6748: 
 6749: tpp_udp_client_handler(Parent) ->
 6750:     tpp_udp_client_handler_init(Parent),
 6751:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start command"),
 6752:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent),
 6753:     ?SEV_IPRINT("start command with"
 6754:                 "~n   ServerSA: ~p", [ServerSA]),
 6755:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 6756:     Sock     = tpp_udp_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
 6757:     Path     = tpp_udp_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
 6758:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready", []),
 6759:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 6760:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, send),
 6761:     ?SEV_IPRINT("received continue with"
 6762:                 "~n   Num: ~p", [Num]),
 6763:     Result = tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, ServerSA, 
 6764:                                                  Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
 6765:     ?SEV_IPRINT("ready"),
 6766:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
 6767:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 6768:     Reason = tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
 6769:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminate with ~p", [Reason]),
 6770:     tpp_udp_sock_close(Sock, Path),
 6771:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 6772:     exit(Reason).
 6773: 
 6774: tpp_udp_client_handler_init(Parent) ->
 6775:     put(sname, "chandler"),
 6776:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 6777:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 6778:     ok.
 6779: 
 6780: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, ServerSA,
 6781:                                     Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
 6782:     Start = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 6783:     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, ServerSA,
 6784:                                              Send, Recv, InitMsg,
 6785:                                              Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
 6786: 
 6787: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(_Sock, _Dest, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
 6788:                                          Num, Num, Sent, Received,
 6789:                                          Start) ->
 6790:     Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 6791:     {Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
 6792: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock,
 6793: 					 #{family := local} = Dest,
 6794: 					 Send, Recv, Data,
 6795:                                          Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 6796:     case tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) of
 6797:         {ok, SendSz} ->
 6798:             case tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
 6799:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz, Dest} ->
 6800:                     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Dest,
 6801:                                                              Send, Recv,
 6802:                                                              NewData, Num, N+1,
 6803:                                                              Sent+SendSz, 
 6804:                                                              Received+RecvSz, 
 6805:                                                              Start);
 6806:                 {error, RReason} ->
 6807:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, RReason]),
 6808:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
 6809:             end;
 6810:         {error, SReason} ->
 6811:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, SReason]),
 6812:             exit({send, SReason, N})
 6813:     end;
 6814: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock,
 6815: 					 #{addr := Addr, port := Port} = Dest0,
 6816: 					 Send, Recv, Data,
 6817:                                          Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 6818:     case tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest0) of
 6819:         {ok, SendSz} ->
 6820:             case tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
 6821:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz, #{addr := Addr, port := Port} = Dest1} ->
 6822:                     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Dest1,
 6823:                                                              Send, Recv,
 6824:                                                              NewData, Num, N+1,
 6825:                                                              Sent+SendSz, 
 6826:                                                              Received+RecvSz, 
 6827:                                                              Start);
 6828:                 {error, RReason} ->
 6829:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, RReason]),
 6830:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
 6831:             end;
 6832:         {error, SReason} ->
 6833:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, SReason]),
 6834:             exit({send, SReason, N})
 6835:     end.
 6836: 
 6837: 
 6838: tpp_udp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
 6839:     tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
 6840: 
 6841: tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
 6842:     tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
 6843: 
 6844: tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
 6845:     %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6846:     try Recv(Sock, 0) of
 6847:         {ok, {Source, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg}} 
 6848:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
 6849: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6850:             %% We got it all
 6851:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("tpp_udp_recv -> got all: "
 6852:             %%             "~n   Source:     ~p"
 6853:             %%             "~n   Tag:        ~p"
 6854:             %%             "~n   Sz:         ~p"
 6855:             %%             "~n   size(Data): ~p",
 6856:             %%             [Source, Tag, Sz, size(Data)]),
 6857:             {ok, Data, size(Msg), Source};
 6858:         {ok, {_Source, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>>}} ->
 6859: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6860:             {error, {invalid_msg, Sz, size(Data)}};
 6861:         {ok, {_, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>}} ->
 6862: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6863:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
 6864:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6865: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6866:             ERROR
 6867:     catch
 6868: 	C:E:S ->
 6869: 	    {error, {caught, C, E, S}}
 6870:     end.
 6871: 
 6872: tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) ->
 6873:     tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data, Dest).
 6874: 
 6875: tpp_udp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) ->
 6876:     tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data, Dest).
 6877: 
 6878: tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data, Dest) ->
 6879:     DataSz = size(Data),
 6880:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
 6881:     tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, Dest, 0).
 6882: 
 6883: tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, Dest, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
 6884:     case Send(Sock, Msg, Dest) of
 6885:         ok ->
 6886:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
 6887:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
 6888:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
 6889:             tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, Dest,
 6890:                              AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
 6891:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6892:             ERROR
 6893:     end.
 6894:     
 6895: 
 6896: tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
 6897:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 6898:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 6899: 
 6900: tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 6901:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 6902:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 6903: tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 6904:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 6905:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 6906: 
 6907: tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 6908:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 6909:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 6910:         ok ->
 6911:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 6912:             ok;
 6913:         {ok, Data} ->
 6914:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
 6915:             Data;
 6916:         {error, Reason} ->
 6917:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 6918:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 6919:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 6920:     end.
 6921: 
 6922: tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 6923:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 6924:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 6925:         ok ->
 6926:             ok;
 6927:         {error, Reason} ->
 6928:             Reason
 6929:     end.
 6930: 
 6931: 
 6932: tpp_udp_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
 6933:     case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6934:         {ok, Sock} ->
 6935:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
 6936:             Sock;
 6937:         {error, Reason} ->
 6938:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 6939:     end.
 6940: 
 6941: tpp_udp_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 6942:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6943:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6944:         ok ->
 6945:             ok;
 6946:         {error, Reason} ->
 6947:             exit({bind, Reason})
 6948:     end.
 6949: 
 6950: tpp_udp_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
 6951:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 6952:         ok ->
 6953:             unlink_path(Path),
 6954:             ok;
 6955:         {error, Reason} ->
 6956:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed closing socket: "
 6957:                         "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6958:             unlink_path(Path),
 6959:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 6960:     end.
 6961: 
 6962: 
 6963: 
 6964: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6965: 
 6966: sock_bind(Sock, LSA) ->
 6967:     try socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6968:         ok = OK ->
 6969:             OK;
 6970:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 6971:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Address not available"),
 6972:             throw({skip, Reason});
 6973:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6974:             ERROR
 6975:     catch
 6976:         C:E:S ->
 6977:             ?FAIL({bind, C, E, S})
 6978:     end.
 6979:

 6983: local_host() ->
 6984:     try net_adm:localhost() of
 6985:         Host when is_list(Host) ->
 6986: 	    %% Convert to shortname if long
 6987: 	    case string:tokens(Host, [$.]) of
 6988: 		[H|_] ->
 6989: 		    list_to_atom(H)
 6990: 	    end
 6991:     catch
 6992:         C:E:S ->
 6993:             erlang:raise(C, E, S)
 6994:     end.
 6995: 
 6996: 
 6997: %% The point of this is to "ensure" that paths from different test runs
 6998: %% don't clash.
 6999: 
 7000: mk_unique_path() ->
 7001:     ?SLIB:mk_unique_path().
 7002: 
 7003: 
 7004: which_local_socket_addr(local = Domain) ->
 7005:     #{family => Domain,
 7006:       path   => mk_unique_path()};
 7007: 
 7008: %% This gets the local socket address (not 127.0...)
 7009: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
 7010: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
 7011: which_local_socket_addr(Domain) ->
 7012:     case ?KLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
 7013:         {ok, [#{addr := Addr}|_]} ->
 7014:             #{family => Domain,
 7015:               addr   => Addr};
 7016:         {error, Reason} ->
 7017:             ?FAIL(Reason)
 7018:     end.

 7025: etc_issue() ->
 7026:     string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")).

 7028: is_old_fedora16() ->
 7029:     is_old_fedora16( etc_issue() ).
 7030: 
 7031: %% We actually only have one host running this, a slow VM.
 7032: is_old_fedora16("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
 7033:     skip("Very slow VM");
 7034: is_old_fedora16(_) ->
 7035:     ok.
 7036: 
 7037: 
 7038: %% This is a bit subjective, but...
 7039: %% ..we have some WMs that is not "fast enough", but the only
 7040: %% thing we can test on is 'esock factor' (other than host name).
 7041: %% This means we actually skip this on platforms where its
 7042: %% not actually needed.
 7043: %% The host in question is a Ubuntu 20.04...
 7044: is_slow_ubuntu(Config) ->
 7045:     case lookup(kernel_factor, 1, Config) of
 7046: 	F when is_integer(F) andalso (F > 1) ->
 7047: 	    case os:type() of
 7048: 		{unix, linux} ->
 7049: 		    case etc_issue() of
 7050: 			"Ubuntu 20.04" ++ _ ->
 7051: 			    skip("Slow Ubuntu host");
 7052: 			_ ->
 7053: 			    ok
 7054: 		    end;
 7055: 		_ ->
 7056: 		    ok
 7057: 	    end;
 7058: 	_ ->
 7059: 	    ok
 7060:     end.
 7061: 
 7062: 
 7063: is_not_windows() ->
 7064:     case os:type() of
 7065:         {win32, nt} ->
 7066:             skip("This does not work on Windows");
 7067:         _ ->
 7068:             ok
 7069:     end.

 7072:     is_not_flakey_os(erlang:system_info(system_architecture)).

 7075:     skip('flakey os');
 7076: is_not_flakey_os("x86_64-pc-solaris2.11") ->
 7077:     skip('flakey os');
 7078: is_not_flakey_os(_) ->
 7079:     ok.

 7090: has_support_sctp() ->
 7091:     case os:type() of
 7092:         {win32, _} ->
 7093:             skip("Not supported");
 7094:         {unix, netbsd} ->
 7095:             %% XYZ We will have to investigate this later...
 7096:             skip("Not supported");
 7097:         _ ->
 7098:             case socket:is_supported(sctp) of
 7099:                 true ->
 7100:                     ok;
 7101:                 false ->
 7102:                     skip("Not supported")
 7103:             end
 7104:     end.

 7119: unlink_path(Path) ->
 7120:     unlink_path(Path, fun() -> ok end, fun() -> ok end).
 7121: 
 7122: unlink_path(Path, Success, Failure)
 7123:   when is_function(Success, 0), is_function(Failure, 0) ->
 7124:     case Path of
 7125:         undefined ->
 7126:             ?SEV_IPRINT("not a path to unlink"),
 7127:                     Success();
 7128:         _ ->
 7129:             ?SEV_IPRINT("try unlink path: "
 7130:                         "~n   ~s", [Path]),
 7131:             case file:delete(Path) of
 7132:                 ok ->
 7133:                     ?SEV_IPRINT("path unlinked: "
 7134:                                 "~n   Path: ~s", [Path]),
 7135:                     Success();
 7136:                 Error ->
 7137:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("unlink failed: "
 7138:                                 "~n   Path: ~s"
 7139:                                 "~n   Res:  ~p", [Path, Error]),
 7140:                     Failure()
 7141:             end
 7142:     end.

 7159: lookup(Key, Default, Config) ->
 7160:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 7161:         {value, {Key, Value}} ->
 7162:             Value;
 7163:         _ ->
 7164:             Default
 7165:     end.

 7170: tdiff({A1, B1, C1} = _T1x, {A2, B2, C2} = _T2x) ->
 7171:     T1 = A1*1000000000+B1*1000+(C1 div 1000), 
 7172:     T2 = A2*1000000000+B2*1000+(C2 div 1000), 
 7173:     T2 - T1.

 7183: 
 7184: start_node(Name) ->
 7185:     start_node(Name, 5000).
 7186: 
 7187: start_node(Name, Timeout) when is_integer(Timeout) andalso (Timeout > 0) ->
 7188:     Pa   = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 7189:     Args = ["-pa", Pa,
 7190:             "-s", atom_to_list(?PROXY), "start", atom_to_list(node()),
 7191:             "-s", "global", "sync"],
 7192:     try ?CT_PEER(#{name      => Name,
 7193:                    wait_boot => Timeout,
 7194:                    args      => Args}) of
 7195:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
 7196:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Started node ~p - now (global) sync", [Name]),
 7197:             global:sync(), % Again, just in case...
 7198:             ?SEV_IPRINT("ping proxy"),
 7199:             pong = ?PPING(Node),
 7200:             {Peer, Node};
 7201:         {error, Reason} ->
 7202:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed starting node ~p (=> SKIP):"
 7203:                         "~n   ~p", [Name, Reason]),
 7204:             skip(Reason)
 7205:     catch
 7206:         Class:Reason:Stack ->
 7207:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed starting node: "
 7208:                         "~n   Class:  ~p"
 7209:                         "~n   Reason: ~p"
 7210:                         "~n   Stack:  ~p",
 7211:                         [Class, Reason, Stack]),
 7212:             skip({node_start, Class, Reason})
 7213:     end.
 7214:

 7218: sock_port(S) ->
 7219:     case socket:sockname(S) of
 7220:         {ok, #{port := Port}} -> Port;
 7221:         {ok, #{}}             -> undefined
 7222:     end.

 7230: i(F) ->
 7231:     i(F, []).
 7232: 
 7233: i(F, A) ->
 7234:     FStr = ?F("[~s] " ++ F, [?FTS()|A]),
 7235:     io:format(user, FStr ++ "~n", []),
 7236:     io:format(FStr, []).
 7237:
